thread.title: More than 60MW Extra For the Grid
thread.title_full: More than 60MW Extra For the Grid

title: More than 60MW Extra For the Grid
text:
More than 60MW Extra For the Grid 03 September 2015 by Munters Print Email Company Details 
Munters Gas Turbine Evaporative Cooling (GTEC) minimizes power shortage by increasing turbine power output by more than 23%. 
Wadi al Jizzi is a power station in the Sultanate of Oman, run by the state-owned company WAJPCO. 
As a part of their business plan WAJPCO wanted to increase the power capacity in the plant to meet expected short falls in power. 
Different scenarios were studied and installation of Munters evaporative air coolers at the inlets of the gas turbines for enhancement of the power output was selected. 
To find out more, download this white paper. Available Downloads
